actions.title: veraPDF Validation
actions.name: verapdf_validation
actions.desc: veraPDF software will validate all PDF/A parts & conformance levels. Users can define further checks in order to enforce institutional policy

configurations.title: Generate veraPDF HTML Report Docker
configurations.name: html_validation_report_flavour
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report in HTML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-verapdf:latest validate --flavour "${flavour}" --format html --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_html}"

configurations.title: Generate veraPDF HTML Report Docker
configurations.name: html_validation_report_profile
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report with profile in HTML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-verapdf:latest validate --profile "/data/${profile}" --format html --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_html}"

configurations.title: Generate veraPDF XML Report Docker
configurations.name: xml_validation_report_flavour
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report in XML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-verapdf:latest validate --flavour "${flavour}" --format xml --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_xml}"

configurations.title: Generate veraPDF XML Report Docker
configurations.name: xml_validation_report_profile
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report with profile in XML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-verapdf:latest validate --profile "/data/${profile}" --format xml --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_xml}"

args.name: max_failures
args.desc: Limit of checked fails. If fails reached limit, validation stops.

args.name: max_failures_displayed
args.desc: Maximum fails to displayed. If -1, displayed all.

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Path to PDF document you want to proccess
